import React, { useEffect } from 'react' import '../../../styles/Rooms.scss' import { getAllRooms } from '../../../actions/rooms' import { Link, useLocation } from 'react-router-dom' import { useDispatch, useSelector } from 'react-redux' import BookWidget from '../../booking/BookWidget' /* import RoomsJSON from "../../../rooms.json"; */ const Rooms = () => { const dispatch = useDispatch() const location = useLocation() useEffect(() => { dispatch(getAllRooms()) }, [location]) const rooms = useSelector((state) => state.rooms.rooms) return (

) } export default Rooms
